G

game - Variable in class players.Player
Object that allow you to interact with the game
game_cards - Variable in class ourvideopoker.OurVideoPoker
This filed represents the cards that he machine have , for that it uses a object of type HandCards
game_deck - Variable in class ourvideopoker.OurVideoPoker
This field is the Deck of the videopoker machine.
game_stats - Variable in class ourvideopoker.OurVideoPoker
For save the machine Statistics we use a object of type Statistics to handl the hands that had been given in the past
game_stats - Variable in class videopoker.StatisticsResult
This class have a string description of the statistics at the time of the command
gamecards - Variable in class cards.HandCards
 
GameNotVisible() - Method in class players.GuiPlayer
Method that allow the main game to become visible
gamestate - Variable in class ourvideopoker.OurVideoPoker
To implement the game we use a simple StateMachine, this field is the state of the game at each time 0 - begin 1 - after first bet 2 - after deal 3 - after the hold - and end of play 4 - after the bet but not the first bet
GameVisible() - Method in class players.GuiPlayer
Method that allow the main game to become visible
get_card() - Method in class cards.DebugDeck
Method to get one card from Deck
get_card() - Method in class cards.Deck
Get first Card of Deck and put it at the end of Deck
getBet() - Method in class videopoker.BetResult
Getter Method for the bet field
getCardN(int) - Method in class cards.HandCards
method that return the card specified in the index
getCredits() - Method in class videopoker.Result
Getter method for the field credits
getGameCards() - Method in class cards.HandCards
getter method for the game cards
getHand() - Method in class videopoker.ResultWithHand
Getter for the player hand after the play move
getHoldCards() - Method in class videopoker.AdviceResult
Getter method for the boolean array hold_cards - that is the cards that the adviser recomends to the player to hold
getIndex(Card) - Method in class cards.HandCards
method that given a card check gives it index in the hand, or -1 if not present
getPayout(HandCards, int) - Method in class ourvideopoker.DoubleBonus10_7
Method that takes a hand of cards and the bet that the player have placed and returns the respective payout
getPayout(HandCards, int) - Method in interface videopoker.VideoPokerVariation
given a hand and a bet this method gives the payout of that hand based in the variation that we implement
getSuit() - Method in class cards.Card
Getter to Suit
getValue() - Method in class cards.Card
Getter to CardValue
GuiPlayer - Class in players
Class that allow you to play the Videopoker with an graphic interface
GuiPlayer() - Constructor for class players.GuiPlayer
